searchUrl:
<js> 
//æ³¨æ„ï¼šä¸€èˆ¬ç½‘ç«™é»˜è®¤é¦–é¡µ(å³baseUrl)æœ‰æœç´¢æ¡†ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¯·å¡«å…¥æœç´¢é¡µé¢åœ°å€
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\nâ€¼ï¸è¯·å¡«å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„Urlâ€¼ï¸\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//æ¡Œé¢ç‰ˆUA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//æ‰‹æœºç‰ˆUA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //è¯·è‡ªè¡Œé€‰æ‹©UAï¼Œâ†“â†“â†“å¡«å…¥æ­¤å¤„
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// è·å–åŒ…å«<li>å…ƒç´ çš„<div>å…ƒç´ 
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// å°†divsè½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ•°ç»„ä»¥ä¾¿æ’åº
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// æŒ‰ç…§data-idå±æ€§å¯¹divArrayè¿›è¡Œæ’åº
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// éå†æ’åºåçš„divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // è·å–å½“å‰divä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰<li>å…ƒç´ 
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // ä½¿ç”¨data-idå±æ€§
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

// è§£æåˆ†ç±»æ•°æ®
function parseCategory(data) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow] = data.split(separator);
  
  const fullUrl = /^\d+|natural/.test(url) 
    ? `http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%22${url}%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148`
    : url;
  
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// è§£ææ ‡ç­¾æ•°æ®
function parseTag(data, tagCategory) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow, tagType] = data.split(separator);
  
  let fullUrl = url;
  if (tagType === "bq") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=${url}&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;
  } else if (tagType === "at") {
  	fullUrl = `https://app-cdn.jjwxc.com/androidapi/authorColumn?authorid=${url}`;
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "class") {
  	fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/incrementFavorite,{'method':'POST','body':\"versionCode=313&token=${token}&order=1&classId=${url}&backupTime=${Date.now()}\"}`
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "lx") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=${url}&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;
  }
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// åˆ›å»º FlexBox å¯¹è±¡
function createFlexBox(title, url, num) {
  const flexBasisMap = { 1: 1, 2: 0.4, 3: 0.25, 4: 0.2, 5: 0.15, 7: 0.1, 10: 0.05 };
  return {
    title,
    url: url || '',
    style: {
      layout_flexGrow: 1,
      layout_flexBasisPercent: flexBasisMap[num]
    }
  };
}

	function removeDuplicatedParagraphs(text, chapterTitle) {

<js>
(function(){
    // ä½¿ç”¨æ­£åˆ™æ£€æµ‹åˆ†é¡µæ ‡ç­¾
    const hasNextLink = /<a\s+rel=\"next\"\s+class=\"next\"[^>]*>ä¸‹â€”é¡µ<\/a>/i.test(result);
    if (!hasNextLink) return '';
    
    try {
        // åŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆåˆ†é¡µURLï¼ˆé€‚é…æ•°å­—å‹URLï¼‰
        let url = baseUrl;
        const pageMatch = url.match(/(\d+)(?:_(\d+))?\.html$/);
        if (!pageMatch) return '';
        
        const [_, baseId, currentPage] = pageMatch;
        const pageNum = currentPage ? parseInt(currentPage) : 1;
        
        // å®‰å…¨é™åˆ¶ï¼ˆæœ€å¤§3é¡µï¼‰
        if (pageNum > 2) return ''; // ç¬¬3é¡µååœæ­¢
        
        // ç”Ÿæˆæ–°URLï¼ˆå¦‚ /123_2.html â†’ /123_3.htmlï¼‰
        return url.replace(/(\d+)(?:_(\d+))?\.html$/, `${baseId}_${pageNum + 1}.html`);
    } catch(e) {
        return '';
    }
})()
</js>

  let ywkey = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywkey")

  })

<js>
var Regs = [/bookId=(\d+)/i, /\.com\D+?\/(\d+)/i, /(\d+)/i];
var bookId = "";
for (let Reg of Regs) {
    let mat = baseUrl.match(Reg);
    if (mat) {
        bookId = mat[1];
        break;
    }
}
java.ajax(QDSign("v2/bookdetail/get", [
    "bookId=" + bookId
]))
</js>

function login() {
    username = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("è´¦å·");
    password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("å¯†ç ");
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/auth/sign-in`;
    body = JSON.stringify({
        emailOrUsername: username,
        password: password
    });
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    };
    response = java.post(url, body, headers);
    responseBody = response.body();
    authorizationObject = {
        Authorization: `Bearer ${responseBody}`
    };
    header = JSON.stringify(authorizationObject);
    source.putLoginHeader(header);
}
login();
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?books\d?\.fishhawk\.top\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
for (provider in providers) {
    match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    } else {
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
    }
    url
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try{
form=java.getElement("#article form")
txt=java.getElement("#article [class=001] p")
while (form!=""){
	code=String(java.getString("strong@textNodes",form)).trim()
	java.log(code)
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{"body":"captcha=${code}","method":"POST"}`)
	java.setContent(result)
	form=java.getElement("#article form")
	}
b64=result.match(/atob\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
if(result.match(/'aes'\s*===\s*'aes'/)){
	key=result.match(/CryptoJS\.enc\.Base64\.parse\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
	
	txt+=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/ECB/Pkcs7Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray(key)).decryptStr(b64)
	}else{

})()

function getToken(){	return (source.getLoginHeaderMap()!=null && source.getLoginHeaderMap()!="")?source.getLoginHeaderMap().get("login_token"):"0f6bd1d063f202f71c3b84678027ce81"
	}
function getA(){
	return (source.getLoginHeaderMap()!=null && source.getLoginHeaderMap()!="")?source.getLoginHeaderMap().get("account"):"èŒå‹521068519938";
	}
function encode(word){
  	return java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray("L6alxSR4ttjXvcGpZozYtdcJtG4l0tSnQplRUONIRsw="), java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")).encryptBase64(word);
	}
function decode(word){
    	return java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray("L6alxSR4ttjXvcGpZozYtdcJtG4l0tSnQplRUONIRsw="), java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")).decryptStr(word);
}
    	
 function login(){
 	login_name=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("è´¦å·")
passwd=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("å¯†ç ");
    let jsonStr = {
        "login_name": login_name,
        "passwd": passwd,
        "app_signature_md5": "f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94",
        "app_version": "4.1.1",
        "channel": "default"
    }
    let body = "secret_content=" + encode(JSON.stringify(jsonStr));
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    
    url = "https://app.shubl.com/signup/login," + JSON.stringify(option)
    resp = JSON.parse(decode(java.ajax(url)))
    if (resp.code == "100000") {
     body = {
     	"login_token":resp.data.login_token,
     	"account":encodeURI(resp.data.reader_info.account)
     	}
     source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(body)) 
    } else {
        java.toast('â—ï¸ ' + resp.tip + ' â—ï¸')
    }
}

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>
